main.name: PRASHANT
main.description: Experienced Frontend Developer of working in the information technology and services industry
main.bio: Experienced Frontend Developer of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Bootstrap, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), HTML, JS, and Management. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor of Technology (BTech) focused in Computer Science from Haryana Engineering College, Jagadhri.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
